meanings.definition: A geometric figure representing the universe in Hindu and Buddhist symbolism.
meanings.sent1: The mandalas in the temple were intricate and colorful.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed coloring mandalas to relax her mind.
meanings.sent3: The mandalas seemed to dance on the walls, bringing joy to all who saw them.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a mandala of thoughts, swirling and connecting in endless patterns.
meanings.sent5: The mandalas etched in her memory were like windows to another world.

meanings.definition: Any circular figure representing the universe or a microcosm thereof.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful mandala using sand.
meanings.sent2: The mandala on the floor symbolized harmony and balance.
meanings.sent3: As she spun around, the room felt like a spinning mandala of colors.
meanings.sent4: The mandala of life continued to expand, encompassing all experiences.
meanings.sent5: The mandala of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.
